00030 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00031 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00032 #include "LinearQuadrilateral.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00035 
00036 static const char* nonlinear_error 
00037  = "Attempt to use LinearQuadrilateral mapping function for a nonlinear element\n";
00038 
00039 EntityTopology LinearQuadrilateral::element_topology() const
00040   { return QUADRILATERAL; }
00041   
00042 int LinearQuadrilateral::num_nodes() const
00043   { return 4; }
00044 
00045 void LinearQuadrilateral::coefficients( Sample location,
00046                                         NodeSet nodeset,
00047                                         double* coeff_out,
00048                                         size_t* indices_out,
00049                                         size_t& num_coeff,
00050                                         MsqError& err ) const
00051 {
00052   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00053     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00054     return;
00055   }
00056   
00057   coefficients( location, nodeset, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00058 }
00059 
00060 void LinearQuadrilateral::coefficients( Sample location,
00061                                         NodeSet nodeset,
00062                                         double* coeff_out,
00063                                         size_t* indices_out,
00064                                         size_t& num_coeff ) 
00065 {
00066   switch (location.dimension) {
00067     case 0:
00068       num_coeff = 1;
00069       indices_out[0] = location.number;
00070       coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00071       break;
00072     case 1:
00073       num_coeff = 2;
00074       indices_out[0] = location.number;
00075       indices_out[1] = (location.number+1)%4;
00076       coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00077       coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00078       break;
00079     case 2:
00080       num_coeff = 4;
00081       indices_out[0] = 0;
00082       indices_out[1] = 1;
00083       indices_out[2] = 2;
00084       indices_out[3] = 3;
00085       coeff_out[0] = 0.25;
00086       coeff_out[1] = 0.25;
00087       coeff_out[2] = 0.25;
00088       coeff_out[3] = 0.25;
00089       break;
00090     default:
00091       num_coeff = 0;
00092   }
00093 }
00094 
00095 const unsigned  xi = 0;
00096 const unsigned eta = 1;
00097 const int sign[2][4] = {{ -1,  1,  1, -1 },  // xi
00098                         { -1, -1,  1,  1 }}; // eta
00099 
00100 static void derivatives_at_corner( unsigned corner, 
00101                                    size_t* vertex_indices,
00102                                    MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00103                                    size_t& num_vtx )
00104 {
00105   const unsigned adj_in_xi = (5 - corner) % 4;
00106   const unsigned adj_in_eta = 3 - corner;
00107   
00108   num_vtx = 3;
00109   vertex_indices[0] = corner;
00110   vertex_indices[1] = adj_in_xi;
00111   vertex_indices[2] = adj_in_eta;
00112   
00113   derivs[0][0] = sign[ xi][corner];
00114   derivs[0][1] = sign[eta][corner];
00115   derivs[1][0] = sign[ xi][adj_in_xi ];
00116   derivs[1][1] = 0.0;
00117   derivs[2][0] = 0.0;
00118   derivs[2][1] = sign[eta][adj_in_eta];
00119 }
00120 
00121 static void derivatives_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge, 
00122                                      size_t* vertices,
00123                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00124                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00125 {
00126   const unsigned start_vtx =  edge;
00127   const unsigned   end_vtx = (edge+1) % 4;
00128   const unsigned othr1_vtx = (edge+2) % 4;
00129   const unsigned othr2_vtx = (edge+3) % 4;
00130   const unsigned direction = edge % 2;
00131   const unsigned orthogonal = 1 - direction;
00132   
00133   num_vtx = 4;
00134   vertices[0] = 0;
00135   vertices[1] = 1;
00136   vertices[2] = 2;
00137   vertices[3] = 3;
00138   
00139   derivs[start_vtx][direction] = sign[direction][start_vtx];
00140   derivs[  end_vtx][direction] = sign[direction][  end_vtx];
00141   derivs[othr1_vtx][direction] = 0.0;
00142   derivs[othr2_vtx][direction] = 0.0;
00143  
00144   derivs[0][orthogonal] = 0.5 * sign[orthogonal][0];
00145   derivs[1][orthogonal] = 0.5 * sign[orthogonal][1];
00146   derivs[2][orthogonal] = 0.5 * sign[orthogonal][2];
00147   derivs[3][orthogonal] = 0.5 * sign[orthogonal][3];
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 static void derivatives_at_mid_elem( size_t* vertices,
00152                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00153                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00154 {
00155   num_vtx = 4;
00156   vertices[0] = 0; derivs[0][0] = -0.5; derivs[0][1] = -0.5;
00157   vertices[1] = 1; derivs[1][0] =  0.5; derivs[1][1] = -0.5;
00158   vertices[2] = 2; derivs[2][0] =  0.5; derivs[2][1] =  0.5;
00159   vertices[3] = 3; derivs[3][0] = -0.5; derivs[3][1] =  0.5;
00160 }
00161 
00162 void LinearQuadrilateral::derivatives( Sample loc,
00163                                        NodeSet nodeset,
00164                                        size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00165                                        MsqVector<2>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00166                                        size_t& num_vtx,
00167                                        MsqError& err ) const
00168 {
00169   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00170     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00171     return;
00172   }
00173   
00174   derivatives( loc, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00175 }
00176 
00177 void LinearQuadrilateral::derivatives( Sample loc,
00178                                        NodeSet nodeset,
00179                                        size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00180                                        MsqVector<2>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00181                                        size_t& num_vtx )
00182 {
00183   switch (loc.dimension) {
00184     case 0:
00185       derivatives_at_corner( loc.number, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00186       break;
00187     case 1:
00188       derivatives_at_mid_edge( loc.number, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00189       break;
00190     case 2:
00191       derivatives_at_mid_elem( vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00192       break;
00193     default:
00194       num_vtx = 0;
00195   }
00196 }
00197 
00198 void LinearQuadrilateral::ideal( Sample , 
00199                                  MsqMatrix<3,2>& J,
00200                                  MsqError&  ) const
00201 {
00202   J(0,0) = J(1,1) = 1.0;
00203   J(0,1) = J(1,0) = 0.0;
00204   J(2,0) = J(2,1) = 0.0;
00205 }
